body:
Comment 9: 
hi,

same basic outcome (even though one can clearly see -extld=g++ being automatically
inserted):

$ go version
go version devel +ca80c16cf523 Mon Sep 09 12:50:49 2013 -0700 darwin/amd64

$ ./doit

ttt

GOOS_darwin -D GOARCH_amd64 $WORK/ttt/_obj/_cgo_defun.c
gcc -I . -g -O2 -fPIC -m64 -pthread -fno-common -print-libgcc-file-name
